body: @JoeyButler thanks for the PR but I'm :-1: on this - @carlosantoniodasilva had pretty much the same commit the other day, though he included the module rather that calling the method on the module like you've done. I'm not a big fan of single method modules and there's a deeper reason why this method is duplicated that I'm trying to address with a bigger refactoring of `Mapper`. Essentially what I'm doing is refactoring the `@scope` instance variable into a class rather than a hash and `Mapping` becomes a subclass of `Scope`. The `defaults_from_constraints` method would then become a protected instance method and the duplication would be eliminated.
